content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft polished basalt, I need to place 4 basalt in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 basalt from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that 1 basalt has been moved into the crafting grid, I will move another basalt to the right of it, by moving 1 basalt from slot 44 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that 2 basalt have been moved into the crafting grid, I will move another basalt to the bottom of the first basalt, by moving 1 basalt from slot 44 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that 3 basalt have been moved into the crafting grid, I will move the last basalt to the right of the second basalt, by moving 1 basalt from slot 44 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_basalt
inventory=[{"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that 4 basalt have been moved into the crafting grid, I can craft the polished basalt by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
